title: São José (Fort of)
body: The fort of São José on the island of Porto Santo was ordered to be built by the Marquês de Pombal, and in commemoration of the king's name, it was dedicated to that saint. It now belongs to the company Águas do Porto Santo, having been auctioned for 5,225,000 on May 18, 1923 (1921).

Marquês de Pombal: Ordered the construction of the fort
